name: TYPO demo
description:
TYPO is a fanmade spinoff of the cult classic word puzzle game Lingo created by Brenton Wildes, which you can take a look at here.

VERSION 0.2 - GREY COVE

  • new area with 96 new puzzles
  • new sound effects
  • automatic puzzle-exit button
  • less obstructive save window with progress indicator
  • some minor puzzle updates
